description: A Level2A product contains the projected Level1C data, i.e. radiometrically and geometrically corrected TOA reflectance values projected on a uniform grid, given per band/camera. The applied coordinate reference system is the “Geographic Lat/Lon” (EPSG:4326)  projection with a spatial resolution of 1 km.
title: PROBA-V L2A: 1KM projected segment data, COG format - Collection 2
license: Products can be freely downloaded after registration / Licence: https://proba-v.vgt.vito.be/en/data-policy
